overview:
CEO-Founder of Integrity Capital Ltd: a unique secure virtual-data-room system, enabling company directors to process substantial-part of their due diligence documentation, prior to investor contact.

Integrity Capital Ltd is a heavily independently researched venture plan. Simon Gall is seeking seed investment in Q1,2012. (Presentations at Angel-investment networks can be seen on www.simongall.com/EVENTS.htm ).
